Sentencas: In this paper, a combined cooling, heating and power system based on diesel-fueled chemical looping hydrogen generation and solid oxide fuel cell, and with CO2 capture was established.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of a new SOFC-CCHP system with diesel reforming by CLHG to produce hydrogen as fuel

Sentencas: The system can achieve efficient power generation while separating CO2 without energy consumption, and effectively avoid the carbon deposition problem.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of a new SOFC-CCHP system with diesel reforming by CLHG to produce hydrogen as fuel

Sentencas: Aspen software is used to simulate the process of the system, and FORTRAN program is used to calculate, through the thermodynamic analysis model, the unique performance change law of the new system using diesel is obtained, and thermodynamic analysis is performed on the system at last.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of a new SOFC-CCHP system with diesel reforming by CLHG to produce hydrogen as fuel

Sentencas: The results show that the power efficiency of the new system is 54.1%, while the exergy efficiency and fuel energy saving ratio can reach 53%.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of a new SOFC-CCHP system with diesel reforming by CLHG to produce hydrogen as fuel

Sentencas: At the same time, the influence of fuel flow and fuel utilization factor on the system performance does not continue to increase or decrease, and the system performance parameters will have a peak value with the change of pressure.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of a new SOFC-CCHP system with diesel reforming by CLHG to produce hydrogen as fuel

Sentencas: The results not only provide a theoretical basis for the future construction of new diesel-fueled energy supply system, but also provide a new idea for the optimization scheme of energy-saving system and carbon recovery.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of a new SOFC-CCHP system with diesel reforming by CLHG to produce hydrogen as fuel
